channel.title: [508] "TRUE HD" Client & Server [508]
channel.description:
[center]_K8_[/center] [center][img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/6293/51507268.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hopefully this will inspire others in the development in 508-525-533's.[/center]
This is my first 508 server and working progress on my "eventually" (still many updates and problems to fix)to be released source and client. [font=Verdana]NOTE: THIS TOPIC IS NOT FINISHED MORE INFO WILL BE COMMING![/font]
[b]HD:[/b] -This server is programed server side and client side, to be HD. -Fullscreen, Resizable, or Fixed, all grafic adjustments can be made.
[b]Bugs:[/b] -Banking does not like to work with the client. (This is because the "action buttons" arent registed correctly in the server) Note: Will be fixed -Summoning tab likes to show up when it wants to. :/ (trying to figure out the problem)
[img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6858/hdful.png[/img]
[b]Features:[/b] -All skills work. (summoning boost to 138 not fixed yet) (this includes hunter, summoning, construction) -Fight caves with waves 60% done. -Castle Wars -God Wars (just started building - working on aggression=making like real gwd) -Prayer -Godswords and Specs (including anchor) NOTE: Specials do not work on client atm-still configuring.. -Lunar/Ancient/Modern (alch and teles) -Bury Bones -All working skills in pictures below. NOTE: Atm they are just pictures of Skillcapes. (i will add actual pictures of skills being done later on) -Imps fly all around varrock city (for hunter xp) -Two Fully working Quests -Must Complete all Quests to recieve Quest Cape. (There are a total of 15 quests all story writen, being coded one at a time) -Custom Achievement diaries comming soon.
[b]Pictures:[/b] (Images are just to show HD atm, will upload actual skilling tommarrow. :P
-Fully trainable and usable agility. (Training at real agility courses...with real movment-no teleporting) [img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/9715/agility.png[/img]
-40% Construction, Each player has a personal saved house, but working on real house part's atm. :) [img]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/418/construction.png[/img]
-Farming, Plants accually grow with time....(not 100% but working on it) [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/1450/farming.png[/img]
-Herblore, Not all of the herb's can be cleaned and not all potions can be made. (Adding them tommarrow hopefully) [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/8303/herblore.png[/img]
-Fishing 80% done. Catches require standard levels. [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/7839/pngo.png[/img]
-Fletching, 100% self explanatory [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/3658/fletching.png[/img]
-Firemaking, Havn't really tested yet. (codes for it are from bulby's source and his work is good) :) [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/5237/85468949.png[/img]
-Woodcutting, 90% [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/2088/62456182.png[/img]
-Prayer, train by burying bones. Bones accuired through killing. [img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/4969/prayer.png[/img]
-Slayer, Trained by tasks given from the slayer master. [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/3937/slayerp.png[/img]
-Runecrafting, trained by well dur.. crafting runes. curently only one altar (othes added but not configured atm) [img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/78/81115729.png[/img]
-Summoning, Summon with pouches. :) [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/526/summoning.png[/img]
-Hunter, imp catching works (from bulby) except i changed. imps fly around city and populated areas. (working on chins atm) [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/1760/hunt.png[/img]
-Smithing, Barely works atm, smithing bars is as far as i got atm. [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/9969/smith.png[/img]
-Minning, just any normal minning. [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/6922/minning.png[/img]
-Thief, pickpocketing and stalls work. [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/8716/thief.png[/img]
-Bounty Hunter, self explanatory. [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/6370/71183887.png[/img]
-Hair saloon [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/7619/hairsoloon.png[/img]
-THIS IS A SNEEK PEAK AT MY CLEINT. :) (this is in small version)
[b]Client:[/b] -This client was modified by Johns 508. What i though was, when i use to play real rs, on the new "HD" i liked the screen to to be small so i can see whats going on and its handy. Well i liked the way the fullscreen looked and felt but i hated that it was so big. and also has the abbility to change the size to you fit. lol i know, :rolleyes: "pfft, this guy is crazy, lol who cares" well i do.... check it out.
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/5691/screenk.png[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b] Johns HD Client (modified by me a little) Paldino76 Fearny Bulby Me
[b]Based on:[/b] I though rather than having this server be on a whole world, make things complicated, and random things. That i would try and do something new, Base this on Varrock. There are plenty building, areas, trees, and many places that a server needs. also this narrows it down for when players are on, There not all alone trying to find people..
Being able to communicate is huge, which is why i used a command from bulbys server wich i absolutley adore. Is the player finder. It can tell you wherever your freinds are, Wandering, Varrock, GWD, Castle wars. You name it, well for now this good enough for this topic i think for now. I will come back and add and post more. :)
[center]PLEASE TELL ME SOME COOL FEATURES I COULD ADD (That would be awsome) AND SOME FEEDBACK ON WHAT IS POSTED.[/center].

programming, irc, cars


GF.
Last Active:
20 May 2009, 22:51:29 That’s why he wasn’t responding to your PM’s.

And lol LilXCj, it’s funny because DavidScape actually does have working HD and all of these features.

But seriously EVERY SINGLE 508 source has 99.5% of these features, and to get HD working there is an EASY tutorial.
So yes, I’m calling you dumb.
[/quote]
I wasn’t trying to pickup a fight at all, you are, idc calling me dumb, all i want is just a nice 508 with if possible HD, i know there are tuts but im more like fast download, im not going to leech or launch as my own lol, i couldn’t even if i wanted to, my default gateway is broken, and im not looking at everyone’s profile before posting at their thread, that’d be insane, If you can’t understand that, then YOU are the dumb one.
And saying GF over an reply… really… get a life ?
That’s another reason why im not going to spend hours or days making a complete HD client , because i’ve got a life.
Don’t fucking reply because i won’t come here anyway. Now replying again would only show that you’re trying to get a fight. Anyway, thanks for reminding me looking at his profile, but stop making a fight of everything,… it’s just a question i asked him, i dont fucking care if i write a full post and then notice that he’s in-active for over a year already.

I said that because you were going to say your own server. It was meant as a joke.

REASON: He can’t stand jokes and wants a fight over everything just let him have his ego. I think your joke was funny

Read full topic

item.title: [508] "TRUE HD" Client & Server [508]
item.dc:creator: @_K8 _K8_
item.description:
@_K8 wrote:

ok, the client i run for my sever is HD. which true HD clients need is the server to be coded to run HD. otherwise its not a HD client.

the ones that you can connect to any server and play with are 508’s but they are not true HD. Do you get what im saying?

There is this wich is claimed to be HD. (this is what you want to download for your purpose)

(this is from sethscape’s topic not mine) this is not my picture what so ever.

Then there is mine wich is true HD (wich is the one that needs be coded server side.)

Read full topic
